title: internal/logger/logger.go
subtitle: Structured Logging System Flow
description:
StdLogger: A structured logging implementation supporting both JSON and text formats with async capabilities and field-based logging.

Key Features:

  • Dual Format Support: JSON for machine parsing and structured text for human readability
  • Async Logging: Non-blocking log writing with configurable buffer size
  • Field-based Context: Attach structured fields to log messages using WithField/WithFields
author: A.M.Hamidipour
